title: Beyond Crypto's Wild Ride
text:
Staci Warden, the executive director of the Milken Institute, Meltem Demirors, CSO at CoinShares, Kathryn Haungeneral partner at Andreessen Horowitz, Elizabeth Rossiello, founder and CEO of BitPesa, and Elizabeth Stark, the co-founder of Lightning Labs, sit together to discuss the current state of the cryptocurrency ecosystem. Read More

Both the promise and peril of investing in cryptocurrencies has been amply demonstrated over the last year, but beyond the headline-making proliferation of crypto coins and the general volatility of the asset class, the crypto ecosystem as a whole has matured in important and impressive ways. This panel looks beyond questions of short-term valuation to assess the state of the crypto ecosystem today and its potential to decentralize finance.

The video was published on August 25, 2019.
